Description:
Detects addition of users to the local Remote Desktop Users group via "Net" or "Add-LocalGroupMember".

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: User Added to Remote Desktop Users Group
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((command like '%localgroup %' and command like '% /add%') and (command like '%Add-LocalGroupMember %' and command like '% -Group %')) and (command like '%Remote Desktop Users%' or command like '%Utilisateurs du Bureau Ã  distance%' or command like '%Usuarios de escritorio remoto%'))
